channel.title: Error while running client

item.title: Error while running client
item.dc:creator: @VillainScape VillainScape
item.description:
@VillainScape wrote:

[quote=“GerraOnline, post:3, topic:394636”][code=java]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”
});
}
}[/code]

Hmmm… interesting…I’m not entirely sure but try this

[code=java]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[]) {
client.main(new String[]) {
“villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”
};
}
}[/code][/quote]

hmmm. I tried that, but still same error and no difference.

[quote=“i make webclients for you, post:2, topic:394636”]Google it or go to google and post it thereand you willl get a reply I would help you if you was online
Pm me when your on :)[/quote]
Im on now

item.title: Error while running client
item.dc:creator: @VillainScape VillainScape
item.description:
@VillainScape wrote:

When i try to run my client, this is my error from run.bat

VVillainScape v3 is Launching! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client at EGUI.main(EGUI.java:11) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadCass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 1 more Press any key to continue . . .

Its wierd, because this is my EGUI and i dont see a problem.
V[code=java]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”, “villainscape.no-ip.biz”
});
}
}
[/code]
